snippet: An emergency appeal through social media brought an outpouring of donations for the World Food Program, which the agency’s director called unprecedented.
abstract: United Nations' World Food Program says it will resume aid to Syrian refugees after emergency appeal through social media, which resulted in millions of dollars in contributions.
lead_paragraph: An emergency appeal through social media brought an outpouring of donations for the World Food Program, which the agency’s director called unprecedented.

headline.main: U.N. Food Agency to Resume Aid to Syrians After Donors Step Up
headline.print_headline: U.N. Food Agency to Resume Aid to Syrians After Donors Step Up
